title: King John: medieval monster
itunes:title: King John: medieval monster
itunes:subtitle: Nicholas Vincent discusses the life and reign of the infamous 13th-century monarch.
description:
Professor Nicholas Vincent discusses the life and reign of the infamous 13th-century monarch, whose reign saw military disasters abroad and the sealing of Magna Carta in 1215.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
